isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING FANS - DESCRIPTION - CUMMINS M11, N14

svcprocinfo.para: Fan controls for Cummins M11, N14 engines.

svcsubproc.title: Horton Engine Fan Controls W/ECM Control System
svcsubproc.para: Refer to circuit diagram HORTON AND KYSOR ENGINE FAN W/CUMMINS M11, N14 CELECT in CTS-5119S.
The ECM is used to control the Horton engine cooling fan clutch. Other fan control components include:

item.para: An air conditioning high pressure switch.

svcsubproc.para: The Solenoid relay is controlled by the ECM using information from the Coolant Temperature Sensor, Retarder Solenoid status and AC High Pressure switch.

svcsubproc.title: Horton Engine Fan Controls W/Index K7A Control System
svcsubproc.para: Refer to circuit diagram HORTON AND KYSOR ENGINE FAN W/INDEX K7A CONTROL SYSTEM W/CUMMINS M11, N14 CELECT in CTS-5119S.
An optional Horton fan with Index K7A control system is available with Cummins M11 and N14 Celect engines or the Caterpillar 3406C mechanically controlled engine. This control system includes:

item.para: An air conditioning high pressure switch.
A Index K7A solid-state fan temperature switch with 3 minute delay feature.

svcsubproc.para: The Solenoid relay is controlled by the Index K7A Control and AC High Pressure Switch.

svcsubproc.title: Kysor Engine Fan Controls W/Index K7A Control System
svcsubproc.para: Refer to circuit diagram HORTON AND KYSOR ENGINE FAN W/CUMMINS M11, N14 CELECT in CTS-5119S.
An optional Kysor fan with Index K7A control system is available with Cummins M11 and N14 Celect engines or the Caterpillar 3406C mechanically controlled engine. This control system includes:

item.para: An Air Conditioning high pressure switch.

svcsubproc.para: The Solenoid relay is controlled by the Index K7A Control and AC High Pressure Switch.
